Description:
On the outskirts of the city, you discover the Sahti district. The streets are vibrant, teeming with resources from the surrounding islands. At the dock, various ships are for sale, and some are even available for free if you're willing to repair them. 

When you search for the dock foreman, you find him visibly desperate for help.

He explains that his people, the Sahti, are terrified of the fishmen. In exchange for your assistance in dealing with this threat, he offers to lend you a ship.
DescriptionAction: What would you like to do?

    "SSRewardText": "The foreman smiles in relief when Sigrun speaks. \r\n\n(Foreman) “I have heard much about your deeds, Sigrun, but I’ve never had the chance to meet you in person. The elder speaks highly of you. Please, take this token to him. He will be glad to see that you are helping our people once again. You are welcome to use my sloop.” \r\n\nYou board the foreman’s ship, and soon, you are sailing the seas in search of new adventures!",

    "SSRewardText": "(Foreman) “Master Bernard, is that you? I didn’t expect to find you here. Thanks to the tides that brought you here. He also directs you to his tools, noting that it's in his best interest to clear the space occupied by the broken ship at the dock.\n\nUnfortunately, repairing the ship turns out to be more difficult than you expected, and your attempts are somewhat laughable. Dockworkers gather around to watch the spectacle, and after a while of joking and laughing, they decide to show you how it's done.\n\nThanks to their help, the ship is finally repaired, but you can't shake the feeling that they'll be telling stories of your poor craftsmanship for months.",
